00014 class ActiveFile{
00015 public:
00016   CharString name;
00017 protected:
00018   time_t mod_time;
00019 protected:
00020   time_t getFileModTime();
00021 public:
00022   ActiveFile()
00023     {mod_time=0;}
00024 
00025   void init(const char *_name)
00026     {name=_name; mod_time=0;}
00027   const char *operator()()
00028     {return(name());}
00029 
00030   void invalidate()
00031     {mod_time=0;}
00032   bool isModified()
00033     {return(mod_time != getFileModTime());}
00034   void markAsRead()
00035     {mod_time = getFileModTime();}
00036 };
00037 
00038 class WatchFiles{
00039 protected:
00040   static const uint32_t ModEvents = IN_CLOSE_WRITE|IN_MOVE_SELF;
00041 
00042 public:
00043   class Watch{
00044   protected:
00045     WatchFiles *parent;
00046     int wd; // watch descriptor
00047   public:
00048     Watch()
00049       {parent=NULL; wd=-1;}
00050     Watch(const Watch &w)
00051       {parent=w.parent; wd=w.wd;}
00052 
00053     bool valid()
00054       {return(parent!=NULL && wd>=0);}
00055     bool watch(WatchFiles *_parent,const char *filename)
00056       {return(_parent && _parent->addWatch(*this,filename));}
00057     bool rewatch(const char *filename)
00058       {return(parent && parent->addWatch(*this,filename));}
00059     bool remove()
00060       {return(parent && parent->removeWatch(*this));}
00061 
00062     bool isFileModified()
00063       {return(parent && (parent->calcEventMask(*this) & ModEvents));}
00064 
00065     friend class WatchFiles;
00066   };
00067 
00068 protected:
00069   std::vector<inotify_event> events;
00070   int inotify_fd;
00071   int num_watches;
00072 public:
00073   WatchFiles()
00074     {inotify_fd=-1; num_watches=0;}
00075   ~WatchFiles()
00076     {reset();}
00077 
00078   bool init();
00079   void reset();
00080   bool isInited()
00081     {return(inotify_fd >= 0);}
00082 
00083   bool addWatch(Watch &w,const char *filename);
00084   bool removeWatch(Watch &w);
00085   uint32_t calcEventMask(Watch &w);
00086 
00087   int getEvents();
00088   int getNumEvents()
00089     {return(events.size());}
00090   void clearEvents()
00091     {events.clear();}
00092 };
